Understanding the Sustainability Landscape

In shaping the future of energy, we recognise the importance of addressing key sustainability challenges. From climate change to social equity, we are committed to making a positive impact on the environment and communities we serve.

Transition Finance Framework

First Electricity Utility in ASEAN to Launch a Transition Finance Framework

First Electricity Utility in ASEAN to Launch a Transition Finance Framework

A Major Milestone in Sustainable Energy Financing

TNB’s inaugural Transition Finance Framework strengthens our Net Zero journey by linking energy strategy with financing best practices. Endorsed by Morningstar Sustainalytics, the framework is aligned with international ESG standards including Green, Social, and Sustainability Bond Principles.
